article.title: Alliant Provides Spider Networked Munitions
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Alliant Techsystems Incorporated, Plymouth, Minnesota, was awarded a $58,272,447 firm-fixed-price contract modification to procure Spider XM-7 networked munitions systems.Â The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Picatinny Arsenal, New Jersey, is the contracting activity.
